verse

and i used to be this girl of your dreams

verse 1

never thought this many people would even know my name
as time flies way above me
for you ive cried tears ceding
oh glory the prayers carry me
ill be a star you keep directing me
lets make the best scene theyve ever seen

verse 2
lets capture the moment
cause even forever aint forever

lets live in the moment
